dublin_core.dcvalue: This is the presentation by Menekse Gencer of mPay Connect How can mobile money improve health outcomes It was given at the May 28 2013 meeting of the mHealth Working Group on Mobile Money Please see also Mobile Money for Health under Resources which includes presentations by Pamela Riley HFG project Setting the contextAndrew Karlyn USAID Mobile Solutions Why does mobile money matter Steve Ollis D Tree Zanzibar use case for safer deliveriesJudy Gold Marie Stopes International Madagascar family planning voucher use caseHamilton McNutt NetHope Tools to support transition to mobile money
Menekse Gencer, mPay Connect: How can mobile money improve health outcomes?
